meaning: For me... / As far as I'm concerned...
example_zh: 对我来说，家人是最重要的。
example_py: Duì wǒ lái shuō, jiārén shì zuì zhòng yào de.
example_en: For me, family is the most important thing.

example_zh: 我觉得这个主意很好。
example_py: Wǒ juéde zhège zhǔyì hěn hǎo.
example_en: I think this idea is very good.

example_zh: 虽然很累，但是我还是坚持下去。
example_py: Suīrán hěn lèi, dànshì wǒ háishi jiānchí xiàqù.
example_en: Although I'm tired, I still persevere.

example_zh: 她不仅聪明，而且很勤奋。
example_py: Tā bù jǐn cōngmíng, érqiě hěn qínfèn.
example_en: She is not only smart but also very hardworking.

example_zh: 如果你努力学习，就会成功。
example_py: Rúguǒ nǐ nǔlì xuéxí, jiù huì chénggōng.
example_en: If you study hard, you will succeed.

example_zh: 我认为保护环境很重要。
example_py: Wǒ rènwéi bǎohù huánjìng hěn zhòngyào.
example_en: I believe protecting the environment is very important.

example_zh: 由于下雨，所以比赛取消了。
example_py: Yóuyú xià yǔ, suǒyǐ bǐsài qǔxiāo le.
example_en: Due to the rain, the game was cancelled.

example_zh: 随着科技的发展，生活越来越方便。
example_py: Suízhe kējì de fāzhǎn, shēnghuó yuè lái yuè fāngbiàn.
example_en: With the development of technology, life is becoming more and more convenient.

example_zh: 总的来说，这次旅行很成功。
example_py: Zǒng de lái shuō, zhè cì lǚxíng hěn chénggōng.
example_en: Generally speaking, this trip was very successful.

meaning: On one hand... on the other hand...
example_zh: 一方面要工作，另一方面要照顾家庭。
example_py: Yī fāngmiàn yào gōngzuò, lìng yī fāngmiàn yào zhàogu jiātíng.
example_en: On one hand, one must work; on the other hand, care for the family.

example_zh: 不管多困难，我都不会放弃。
example_py: Bùguǎn duō kùnnán, wǒ dōu bù huì fàngqì.
example_en: No matter how difficult, I will not give up.

example_zh: 为了健康，我每天坚持运动。
example_py: Wèile jiànkāng, wǒ měitiān jiānchí yùndòng.
example_en: In order to stay healthy, I exercise every day.

example_zh: 除了英语，她还会说法语。
example_py: Chúle Yīngyǔ, tā hái huì shuō Fǎyǔ.
example_en: Besides English, she can also speak French.

example_zh: 事实上，情况比我们想象的复杂。
example_py: Shìshí shàng, qíngkuàng bǐ wǒmen xiǎngxiàng de fùzá.
example_en: In fact, the situation is more complex than we imagined.

example_zh: 值得注意的是，这个问题越来越严重。
example_py: Zhídé zhùyì de shì, zhège wèntí yuè lái yuè yánzhòng.
example_en: It is worth noting that this problem is becoming increasingly serious.

example_zh: 经济在发展，与此同时环境问题也在加剧。
example_py: Jīngjì zài fāzhǎn, yǔ cǐ tóngshí huánjìng wèntí yě zài jiājù.
example_en: The economy is developing; meanwhile, environmental problems are also worsening.

example_zh: 换句话说，我们需要改变策略。
example_py: Huàn jù huà shuō, wǒmen xūyào gǎibiàn cèlüè.
example_en: In other words, we need to change our strategy.

example_zh: 总而言之，这次合作非常成功。
example_py: Zǒng ér yán zhī, zhè cì hézuò fēicháng chénggōng.
example_en: In conclusion, this collaboration was very successful.

pinyin: Cóng mǒu zhǒng yìyì shàng shuō...
meaning: In a sense... / In some ways...
example_zh: 从某种意义上说，失败是成功的开始。
example_py: Cóng mǒu zhǒng yìyì shàng shuō, shībài shì chénggōng de kāishǐ.
example_en: In a sense, failure is the beginning of success.

meaning: Some people think... / It is argued...
example_zh: 有人认为科技让人们的距离更远了。
example_py: Yǒu rén rènwéi kējì ràng rénmen de jùlí gèng yuǎn le.
example_en: Some people think technology has made people more distant from each other.

example_zh: 正如老师所说，勤奋是成功的关键。
example_py: Zhèng rú lǎoshī suǒ shuō, qínfèn shì chénggōng de guānjiàn.
example_en: Just as the teacher said, diligence is the key to success.

example_zh: 在某种程度上，压力可以激发人的潜能。
example_py: Zài mǒu zhǒng chéngdù shàng, yālì kěyǐ jīfā rén de qiánnéng.
example_en: To a certain extent, pressure can stimulate a person's potential.

example_zh: 据报道，这项技术将改变我们的生活。
example_py: Jù bàodào, zhè xiàng jìshù jiāng gǎibiàn wǒmen de shēnghuó.
example_en: According to reports, this technology will change our lives.

meaning: In my opinion... / The way I see it...
example_zh: 以我看来，解决这个问题需要团队合作。
example_py: Yǐ wǒ kàn lái, jiějué zhège wèntí xūyào tuánduì hézuò.
example_en: In my opinion, solving this problem requires teamwork.

example_zh: 他遇到了很多困难，尽管如此，他没有放弃。
example_py: Tā yùdào le hěn duō kùnnán, jǐnguǎn rúcǐ, tā méiyǒu fàngqì.
example_en: He encountered many difficulties; nevertheless, he did not give up.

example_zh: 关于环境保护问题，政府采取了很多措施。
example_py: Guānyú huánjìng bǎohù wèntí, zhèngfǔ cǎiqǔ le hěn duō cuòshī.
example_en: Regarding the issue of environmental protection, the government has taken many measures.

example_zh: 值得一提的是，这位科学家只有三十岁。
example_py: Zhídé yī tí de shì, zhè wèi kēxuéjiā zhǐyǒu sānshí suì.
example_en: It is worth mentioning that this scientist is only thirty years old.

meaning: Without a doubt... / There is no doubt...
example_zh: 毫无疑问，教育对社会的发展至关重要。
example_py: Háo wú yíwèn, jiàoyù duì shèhuì de fāzhǎn zhìguān zhòngyào.
example_en: Without a doubt, education is crucial to the development of society.

example_zh: 可以说，努力是成功的基础。
example_py: Kěyǐ shuō, nǔlì shì chénggōng de jīchǔ.
example_en: It can be said that effort is the foundation of success.

meaning: As far as I know... / To my knowledge...
example_zh: 据我所知，这个项目已经完成了。
example_py: Jù wǒ suǒ zhī, zhège xiàngmù yǐjīng wánchéng le.
example_en: As far as I know, this project has already been completed.

meaning: In the long run... / Looking at the long term...
example_zh: 从长远来看，投资教育是最明智的选择。
example_py: Cóng cháng yuǎn lái kàn, tóuzī jiàoyù shì zuì míngzhì de xuǎnzé.
example_en: In the long run, investing in education is the wisest choice.

example_zh: 大多数人认为健康比金钱更重要。
example_py: Dà duōshù rén rènwéi jiànkāng bǐ jīnqián gèng zhòngyào.
example_en: Most people think health is more important than money.

example_zh: 总体而言，这次活动组织得非常好。
example_py: Zǒngtǐ ér yán, zhè cì huódòng zǔzhī de fēicháng hǎo.
example_en: On the whole, this event was very well organized.

example_zh: 与其抱怨，不如想办法解决问题。
example_py: Yǔ qí bàoyuàn, bùrú xiǎng bànfǎ jiějué wèntí.
example_en: Rather than complaining, it's better to think of ways to solve the problem.

meaning: Speaking of... one has to mention...
example_zh: 说到中国文化，就不得不提中医。
example_py: Shuō dào Zhōngguó wénhuà, jiù bùdébù tí Zhōngyī.
example_en: Speaking of Chinese culture, one has to mention traditional Chinese medicine.

example_zh: 从整体上来看，公司的发展势头良好。
example_py: Cóng zhěngtǐ shàng lái kàn, gōngsī de fāzhǎn shìtóu liánghǎo.
example_en: Looking at the overall picture, the company's development momentum is good.

example_zh: 固然钱很重要，但健康更是无价之宝。
example_py: Gùrán qián hěn zhòngyào, dàn jiànkāng gèng shì wú jià zhī bǎo.
example_en: Certainly money is important, but health is even more priceless.

example_zh: 现如今，智能手机已成为人们生活的必需品。
example_py: Xiàn rújīn, zhìnéng shǒujī yǐ chéngwéi rénmen shēnghuó de bìxūpǐn.
example_en: Nowadays, smartphones have become a necessity in people's lives.

meaning: In terms of... / With regard to...
example_zh: 就环境保护而言，我们还有很长的路要走。
example_py: Jiù huánjìng bǎohù ér yán, wǒmen hái yǒu hěn cháng de lù yào zǒu.
example_en: In terms of environmental protection, we still have a long way to go.

meaning: No matter what... / In any case...
example_zh: 无论如何，我们都要完成这项任务。
example_py: Wúlùn rúhé, wǒmen dōu yào wánchéng zhè xiàng rènwù.
example_en: No matter what, we must complete this task.

example_zh: 基于以上原因，我们决定推迟计划。
example_py: Jīyú yǐshàng yuányīn, wǒmen juédìng tuīchí jìhuà.
example_en: Based on the above reasons, we decided to postpone the plan.

pinyin: Cóng lìng yī gè jiǎodù lái kàn...
meaning: From another angle / From a different perspective...
example_zh: 从另一个角度来看，这次挫折是一个机会。
example_py: Cóng lìng yī gè jiǎodù lái kàn, zhè cì cuòzhé shì yī gè jīhuì.
example_en: From another angle, this setback is an opportunity.

meaning: Regrettably... / It is a pity that...
example_zh: 令人遗憾的是，他没能参加这次活动。
example_py: Lìng rén yíhàn de shì, tā méi néng cānjiā zhè cì huódòng.
example_en: Regrettably, he was unable to attend this event.

example_zh: 可喜的是，越来越多的年轻人开始关注环保。
example_py: Kě xǐ de shì, yuè lái yuè duō de niánqīngrén kāishǐ guānzhù huánbǎo.
example_en: Encouragingly, more and more young people are starting to pay attention to environmental protection.

meaning: Anytime and anywhere... / At any time and place...
example_zh: 随时随地，我们都可以通过手机联系。
example_py: Suíshí suídì, wǒmen dōu kěyǐ tōngguò shǒujī liánxì.
example_en: Anytime and anywhere, we can contact each other through our phones.

meaning: For... / As far as ... is concerned...
example_zh: 对于学生来说，学习是第一位的。
example_py: Duìyú xuésheng lái shuō, xuéxí shì dì yī wèi de.
example_en: For students, studying comes first.

meaning: It is plain for all to see... / Evident to everyone...
example_zh: 有目共睹，中国这几十年的发展速度令人惊叹。
example_py: Yǒu mù gòng dǔ, Zhōngguó zhè jǐ shí nián de fāzhǎn sùdù lìng rén jīngtàn.
example_en: It is plain for all to see that China's development speed over the past few decades is astonishing.

example_zh: 进一步说，这项政策还需要更多的完善。
example_py: Jìn yī bù shuō, zhè xiàng zhèngcè hái xūyào gèng duō de wánshàn.
example_en: Furthermore, this policy still needs more improvement.

example_zh: 不可否认，互联网改变了我们的生活方式。
example_py: Bù kě fǒurèn, hùliánwǎng gǎibiàn le wǒmen de shēnghuó fāngshì.
example_en: Undeniably, the internet has changed our way of life.
